## Loading the data

```{r, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
load("house_elections.rda")
load("candidates.rda")
load("committees.rda")
load("contributions.rda")

```

```{r, message = FALSE}
candidates %>%
  filter(cand_office == "S", cand_office_state == "VA") %>%
  mutate(total = sum(n())) %>%
  group_by(cand_election_yr)
